abstract: A major study of nearly 360,000 cellphone users in Denmark found no increased risk of brain tumors with long-term use.
snippet: A major study of nearly 360,000 cellphone users in Denmark found no increased risk of brain tumors with long-term use.
lead_paragraph: A major study of nearly 360,000 cellphone users in Denmark found no increased risk of brain tumors with long-term use.

headline.main: No Cellphone-Cancer Link in Large Study
